title: Start Here
description: Welcome to Backlogged - the game for developers. Click the Get Started button to start your journey as a developer!

title: Get into flow
description: You're starting to get the hang of this development work. Keep up the great work!

title: Add a splash of colour
description: Still here eh? I appreciate the dedication! Now it's time to get to work. The site could use a little colour.

title: Reflect on progress so far
description: You've accomplished so much so far. Take a moment to think about what you've done so far

title: Improve progress bar
description: The progress bar is looking great, but a little jumpy. Let's smooth out that progress indicator.

title: Test new progress bar
description: Let's have a look at how our new progress bar is looking

title: Add support for issue counts
description: It would be helpful to show the number of issues in each column. Add a count of the issues to each step.

title: Create a new front end framework
description: This project would go a lot faster if we just had a new framework that works exactly how we want. Shouldn't take long and will save time by not researching existing frameworks.

title: Find Product Market Fit
description: Okay, so we've got a site, we've got our own framework, now we need to find a product to build. Let's do some research and find a product that the market needs.

title: Customer Interviews
description: Great job! You've found the right product market fit. Now let's talk to some potential customers to see what their pain points are.

title: Hire a Sales Manager
description: Now that we know what we're building, we need someone to sell the product for us. Let's hire part time for now.

title: Hire a Marketing Manager
description: Now that we know what we're building, we need someone to market our product. We need to be all over social media, go viral. Let's hire part time for now.

title: Hire an accountant
description: Now that we've got some staff we need some help to make sure they'll get paid. Let's hire an accountant to help us keep track of things.

title: Start development
description: Okay, we've got a product, we've got clients who what that product. Let's start building that product now

title: Archive Issues
description: Wow, look at all those done issues! You've accomplished so much in so little time. But those issues are starting to pile up. Let's develop a feature to auto-archive older issues.

title: Setup QA Servers
description: We've got a basic app up and running locally. Let's set up a QA environment to run it in the cloud.

title: Setup Prod Servers
description: That was easy enough. Let's repeat the process to setup an identical prod environment.

title: Fix Prod Servers
description: Okay, not sure what happened. The environments have identical configuration, but the prod environment isn't working. A couple of fixes and we should be good to go.

title: Really Fix Prod Servers
description: Okay, that made it worse. Research what error code 10648103 means and we should be good.

title: Add top Navigation
description: Add a navigation bar at the top of the page. This will later be used to hold links.

title: Add About link
description: Now we've got a navigation section, let's add some links. An About page sounds like a good place to start.

title: Add About content
description: Now that we have an about page, let's write some copy to share a bit about the game.

title: Fix Done count
description: When we added the limit to the done column, the count is now always showing 10. Let's fix to to show the true number of done issues.
